column4: I have a ADSL connection, which goes to a modem/router, which goes to a switch, and finally to ca. 10 PCs. How can I measure the amount of traffic coming and going tto/from each PC? NB. I have admin access to everything, I'd rather not to install SW on the PCs, and the router hasn't got such a function..
does the switch provide port utilisation statistics via snmp ?
then I think you have to install something somewhere. If you only care about internet access, you might be able to get something from the router, but it would depend on what the router was.
